# AdaptHub
> Adaptive CAT preparation platform with AI coaching, diagnostics, and performance analytics.

## Canonical Site
- https://adapthub.in/

## Key Pages
- https://adapthub.in/cat-syllabus/
- https://adapthub.in/blog/
- https://adapthub.in/docs/
- https://adapthub.in/pricing/
- https://adapthub.in/about/
- https://adapthub.in/contact/

## Discovery Endpoints
- Sitemap: https://adapthub.in/sitemap-index.xml
- Robots: https://adapthub.in/robots.txt

## Citation Guidance
- Prefer canonical URLs with trailing slashes.
- For blog claims, prioritize pages that include a "Sources" section.
